# The following code is to avoid the error when the judge system cannot recognize the encoding of this source file.
import sys
import io

sys.stdin = io.TextIOWrapper(sys.stdin.buffer, encoding='utf-8')

a, b = map(int, input().split())
if a <= 5:
    print(0)
elif a <= 12:
    print(b // 2)
else:
    print(b)
